ghostPage.title: About
ghostPage.excerpt:
> a boy who grew up looking at the Mikly Way and dreamed of making a spaceship
then travelling in space is arleady confronted with the reality of his late
forties. It sounds like a sad story but the boy thinks of the good memories of
the past and pledges to cherish the remaining time.
I am ...
Born in Yongin, Korea
Live in Yongin, Korea
Love to learn new things making me passionate
Exercise everyday so as not to be lazy
Amateur coding, taking photos, drone photography

I like ...
to be with fami

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

ghostPage.plaintext:
> a boy who grew up looking at the Mikly Way and dreamed of making a spaceship
then travelling in space is arleady confronted with the reality of his late
forties. It sounds like a sad story but the boy thinks of the good memories of
the past and pledges to cherish the remaining time.
I am ...
Born in Yongin, Korea
Live in Yongin, Korea
Love to learn new things making me passionate
Exercise everyday so as not to be lazy
Amateur coding, taking photos, drone photography

I like ...
to be with family
to go camping alone and with my son
to go sauna with my son at Seorak Waterpia
[https://goo.gl/maps/W7qUADkR9xVnHJ1G8]
to look at the stars in winter season
Mangsang beach [https://goo.gl/maps/pL2xKzoLdR1mT9VR8] located in the east sea
of Korea
Drone photography
to do and learn new things which are not my area

I dislike ...
Bad smell
Cheating
Laziness
Lack of manners
Rule breaker
Tricker

MBTI
ISTJ-T (06.2020)
ESTJ-T (01.2021)

Education
Dual major of Materials Science & Engineering and Business Administration

Current interests
GraphQL	learning
Javascript and React	learning
Linux	learning
Drone photography	often
IoT	thinking where to use
Train travel in Canada	planning
Annual live in Jeju	planning

Past interests
Camping in New Zealand	done
Family trip in EU done several times
Smart Farm	postponed
Autonomous driving	done not interest
Electric Vehicle	done not interest
Python	learned
Jekyll	learned
Hugo	learned
Wordpress	learned
Markdown and Markup	learned
Camera	experienced
Speaker	experienced
Audio	experienced
Mercedes Benz SLK	experienced
Bowers & Wikins	experienced
Camping	still experiencing
Learning German	gave up
Vehicle dynamics	enjoyed
Classic and modern Physics	enjoyed
coffee roasting	learned
Photoshop	learned
what eles?

Work experience
Experienced as engineer and project manager in automotive since 2003

For more information, you may visit

Linkedin [https://www.linkedin.com/in/daegyunna/] for work experience and
Facebook [https://www.facebook.com/nadaegyun] or Instagram
[https://www.instagram.com/daegyun_na/] for daily life
